metadata.name: Trippies Golden Egg
metadata.description: Own a slice of Paradise with our collection of 10,000 unique NFTs. Inspired by BAYC #9696, Paradise was seen in Pete's trippy vision, along with the weird and wonderful creatures that lurk there. The Paradise Trippies Golden Egg is a gift to community members who hold all 14 Trippies -- a full house. Something lurks inside the egg. What is it?
